subject: Order messed up
description_text:
Hi, 
I paid for the base plate but did not receive it in the package. 
Please advise.
Thank you,Desiree Weber

Yahoo Mail: Search, Organize, Conquer

conversations.body_text: Hi Desiree Weber,    We apologize for the inconvenience. The Pro X Ultra baseplate is currently out of stock in our US warehouse. New inventory will be replenished tomorrow, and we will ship your order within the next two days.
